Tutorial
**************

The following tutorial comes in the form of a Jupyter notebook. The notebook
can be downloaded `here <https://github.com/i4Ds/IRISreader/blob/master/notebooks/IRISreader_tutorial_notebook.ipynb/>`_.

   :width: 0px
   :height: 0px

.. raw:: html
   :file: _static/IRISreader_tutorial_notebook.html
